name: Recycled Humans.
description:
Save a world that is under siege by the dead—who have been recycled into zombies!
This action game features easy single-finger one-tap control. Just remember the following three actions:

- Tap a spot on the ground to move the hero there.
- Tap the hero to jump.
- Tap an enemy to have the hero shoot it.

The game world is divided into 64 stages.
Pass through the gates connecting the stages to move between them.
Locked gates will require a key!
The hero gains experience—plus life and attack power—by defeating enemies.
Challenge strong enemies to boost your experience!
